ref: 10281 mr̥távatsā f. ʻ woman whose offspring or new -- born child dies ʼ AV., mr̥tavatsikā -- f. lex. [mr̥tá -- , vatsá -- 1]
WPah. (Joshi) mācch ʻ whose offspring never lives long (of women and animals) ʼ;
Or. maṛachī ʻ woman who bears still -- born children or whose children die young ʼ; --
B. maṛā̆ñce, maṛuñce ʻ woman whose children always die ʼ (or < *mr̥tāpatya -- ).
